channel.title: panel test on 我的測試區
channel.description: Recent content in panel test on 我的測試區

item.title: bs_panel測試
item.description: PageTitle main.container { padding: 60px 15px 0; } 我的測試區 空模板 步驟 s1 nav class="navbar navbar-expand-md navbar-dark fixed-top bg-dark" Fixed navbar Home Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 Template with fixed navbar A starter template with a navbar HTML and CSS.

item.title: flex 測試1
item.description: body { background: black; color: white; } div { background: black; } div .prev,.next { border: solid 1px pink; display: flex; align-items: center; flex:0 1 20px; } div.outter { width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: row; border: 2px solid green; resize: both; overflow: auto; } div.sidebar { border: solid 1px pink; color: white; border: 1px solid white; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: left; resize: vertical; width: max-content; padding: 20px; overflow: auto; flex: 0 1 30%; } div.

item.title: googledrive
item.description: Save to Drive Demo: Explicit Render window.___gcfg = { parsetags: 'explicit' }; Render the Save to Drive button function renderSaveToDrive() { gapi.savetodrive.render('savetodrive-div', { src: '//example.com/path/to/myfile.pdf', filename: 'My Statement.pdf', sitename: 'My Company Name' }); } document.getElementById('render-link').addEventListener('click', renderSaveToDrive); function upload(e){ gapi.savetodrive.render('savetodrive-div', { src: e.files[0], filename: 'My Statement.pdf', sitename: 'My Company Name' }); e.value=null; }

item.title: 提點
item.description: 看過的文章 顏色 📌 flex 實驗 水平置中,垂直置中 bootstrap 基本 製表 製表 經過 CodePen 短碼 hugo 排版 中文flex build json REST api HUGO+bootstrap 頭尾 修改themes stack 甚麼是SEO 加評論 網頁搜尋 工具 http request 有用 回到原來位置(bootstrap keep same position after click) 節錄 {{.TableOfContent}} 會產生深的ul li ,用這個移除 {{ .TableOfContents | replaceRE "<ul>[[:space:]]*<li>[[:space:]]*<ul>" "<ul>" | replaceRE "</ul>[[:space:]]*</li>[[:space:]]*</ul>" "</ul>" | safeHTML }} 但是原意是逃脫使用者的設定。 相關文章可以用 {{ $related := .

item.title: 測試javascript in textarea
item.description: #pjs-input { overflow: auto; resize: both; border: 1px solid grey; outline: 1px; background-color: transparent; width: 100%; padding: 2px 4px; height: auto; min-height: 10rem; max-height: 20rem; } #pjs-log { overflow: auto; border: 1px solid grey; } value = "HUGO 變數 執行碼: {{< HugoVarTest >}}\n\r執行結果live\r.Page.CurrentSection: Page(/pages/_index.md) used, which then provides data to the partial few issues come up then.\r.Name is not the name of the res ot; .

item.title: 移植(✔bootstrap)
item.description: Demo - 移植測試 .sidebar li .submenu { list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; } .sidebar .nav-link { font-weight: 500; color: var(--bs-dark); } .sidebar .nav-link:hover { color: var(--bs-primary); } Demo page 我的測試區 var baseurl = "http:\/\/localhost:1313\/~linchao\/test\/"; HUGO的相關測試 4.03b mlogit Encode image in html Hugo 和我的參數 JS,css 的相關註解 partial 的用法(列出所有章節) preview os-summary relativeurls in config.

item.title: 移植(❌bootstrap)
item.description: Demo - 移植測試 -- .sidebar li .submenu { list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; padding-left: 1rem; padding-right: 1rem; } .sidebar .nav-link { font-weight: 500; color: var(--bs-dark); } .sidebar .nav-link:hover { color: var(--bs-primary); } Demo page 我的測試區 var baseurl = "http:\/\/localhost:1313\/~linchao\/test\/"; HUGO的相關測試 4.03b mlogit Encode image in html Hugo 和我的參數 JS,css 的相關註解 partial 的用法(列出所有章節) preview os-summary relativeurls in config.

item.title: 空版第2版
item.description: 空白 .CtxtMenu_InfoClose { top: .2em; right: .2em; } .CtxtMenu_InfoContent { overflow: auto; text-align: left; font-size: 80%; padding: .4em .6em; border: 1px inset; margin: 1em 0px; max-height: 20em; max-width: 30em; background-color: #EEEEEE; white-space: normal; } .CtxtMenu_Info.CtxtMenu_MousePost { outline: none; } .CtxtMenu_Info { position: fixed; left: 50%; width: auto; text-align: center; border: 3px outset; padding: 1em 2em; background-color: #DDDDDD; color: black; cursor: default; font-family: message-box; font-size: 120%; font-style: normal; text-indent: 0; text-transform: none; line-height: normal; letter-spacing: normal; word-spacing: normal; word-wrap: normal; white-space: nowrap; float: none; z-index: 201; border-radius: 15px; /* Opera 10.

item.title: 練習css-形狀位置
item.description: .tags { display: inline-block; line-height: 2em; font-size: 0.8em; position: relative; margin: 0 16px 8px 0; padding: 0 10px 0 12px; background: #8451a1; color:white; } .tags a{ text-decoration: none; color:white; } .tags a:before { content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0; left: -1em; width: 0; height: 0; border-color: transparent #8451a1 transparent transparent; border-style: solid; border-width: 1em 1em 1em 0; } 測試下面的形狀如何產生,主要目的練習除錯器和熟悉margin,padding,absolute,relative之間的關係。 提示:將高度從0改為100px,大概就可以知道為甚麼。 不會連到任何地方

item.title: 練習overflow
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE HTML> <html lang="en">
<head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no"> <meta name="keywords" content="htmlcss bootstrap aside menu, vertical, sidebar nav menu CSS examples" /> <meta name="description" content="Bootstrap 5 sidebar navigation menu example" />
<title>Demo - Bootstrap 5 sidebar vertical menu sample. html code example </title>
<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.0-beta2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" crossorigin="anonymous"> <link href="../css/fontawesome-all.min.css" rel="stylesheet"> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.0-beta2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
<!-- ======= Icons used for dropdown (you can use your own) ======== --> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap-icons@1.4.0/font/bootstrap-icons.css">
</head>
<body class="bg-light">
除了置中外.另一個常見的困擾就是,有時候某些字超出範圍,不顯示。

item.title: 練習找中文
item.description: 各種中文匹配 中文,英文範圍: ^[\u4e00-\u9fa5_a-zA-Z0-9]+$ console.log( "貓的中文很爛,連喵都不標準" .split("") .filter(char => /\p{Script=Han}/u.test(char)) .join("") ); value = "HUGO 變數 執行碼: {{&lt; HugoVarTest &gt;}}\n\r執行結果live\r.Page.CurrentSection: Page(/pages/_index.md) used, which then provides data to the partial {{ partial &quot;partial.html&quot; . }}.\rA few issues come up then.\r.Name is not the name of the resource file, but of the calling index.md file\r.Resources.GetMatch &quot;*&quot; doesn't return a result\r$.Site.Resources or $.Resources d {{ range sort .Resources }}\r{{ $.Scratch.Set &quot;data&quot; . }}\r{{ partial &quot;fragments/test.
